comment: Read the articles that relate to the quiz and you'll get a 100 every time. Only thing you really need to put more effort into is the presentation and the book review. Shes sweet and pretty understanding.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects--Caring

comment: One of the best classes I've taken at KSU, both in terms of interesting content and how easy it is to get an A as long as you actually complete the work. Whoever teaches this class in her place has big shoes to fill, because this class was a gentle breeze. She's retiring after this semester, as far as I know. She will be missed!

She's an awesome professor. Keep up with all of your assignments and participate in class. You'll do fine. Thefe is one paper and group presentation. Attendance is mandatory. Very up beat class. Makes you interested in the class.
Show up, participate, pass. VERY EASY. All she asks for is participation.

She was great, 15 community service hours are a must. YOULL FAIL HER CLASS! 5 page paper about a non profit org. meet the req. and youll do fine. Makes you sign in, so come to class. Tests and quizzes are easy, just study.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Shes a wonderful professor! Easy grader and  really cares about the content. The work load isnt too much, all quizzes are online and only one group project that is assigned about half way through the semester. Highly recommend

She's nice but very unclear when it comes to instructions for assignments. Must attend class. Make sure you understand paper guidelines or she will take off a lot of points. Expects in-class dialog. One semester group project. She's passionate about cultural competence, and the class is easy, I just didn't enjoy her or the material.
rating_tags: Participation matters--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Great teacher. She reviews the study guide in class and test is the exact same as what she reviews.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Caring--Would take again

comment: You have to do 20 volunteer hours to pass the class :((( ! You have 2 major essays but one of them you are required to interview a nonprofit organization which was a pain. On the bright side, she lets class out early EVERYDAY! Easy tests, she gives you study guides for all the tests. Boring material but very easy A!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: I had Prof Bridgeman for Summer Semester. We had two test and a final, one paper, group project w/paper. Show up for class. She gave us a study guide, went over the answers three times before test day and the TEST was EXACTLY the same as the study guide. I got A's on ALL assignments BUT made a C on Final and made a B in the class.  Easy grader.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Material was boring in my opinion, and Bridgeman didn't really attempt to make it interesting. We had to read articles weekly, read chapters in "The Other Wes Moore" which we bought for the class, write a paper on the book and incorporate articles in the paper. We were suppose to have one test--the final--over everything, but a paper took its place
rating_tags: Participation matters--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: The class is heavy on the book & article readings, but it isn't a ton. The class was only one day a week and she always let us out early. Lecture was discussion based and she's a stickler on participation. I received a 100 on every single grade in her class, but I put forth some effort. One paper, a group project, participation and a final.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Great professor. never makes you stay the full amount of class. Readings/tests come from the textbook. I am taking Professor Bridgeman again. Guidelines can be confusing but ask questions!

Nice professor, however she can be very unclear when it comes to instructions for assignments. Must attend class. Receive a lot of participation points. Make sure you understand paper guidelines or she will take off a lot of points. A lot of discussions. One semester group project. She is alright, however I am glad I am done with the class.
